attributes.action: Stop the use of Special Police Constables
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Special Constables are not given the necessary powers to resolve any situation satisfactorily and the ones they have vary from county to county. Crime has not decreased due to their use. The UK would be better served by providing more real Police Officers, instead of spending millions on a weak and ineffectual 'Pretend Police'.
